title: dialog role
description: A dialog is a descendant window of the primary window of a web application. For HTML pages, the primary application window is the entire web document, i.e., the body element.

assertions.title: convey the dialog role
assertions.rationale: Users must be made aware of the dialog context.

assertions.title: convey the name of the dialog
assertions.rationale: Users need to know the purpose of the dialog.
